body: These wristbands appear similar to greater bracers of archery, though they are typically constructed of lighter material. They function as greater bracers of archery, except they grant a +1 competence bonus on attack rolls and no bonus on damage rolls.
name: Bracers of Archery, Lesser
url: pfsrd://Ultimate Equipment/Rules/Wondrous Items/Wrists/Wrists Slot Wondrous Items/Bracers of Archery/Lesser
